title: A Strip Show Went Down At A Retirement Home?!
description:
A few weeks ago, a listener heard us talking about a retirement community in Florida that is WILD. Our listener also happened to work in a retirement community, and she's witnessed some crazy things!
She offered to share her stories…so today, we’re reading our new SENIOR CITIZEN SOAP OPERA!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
